Package com.example.hotpot0.section2.views

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateEventActivity
    Activity for creating a new event.
    EventBlobAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView.
    EventInitialActivity
    Activity that displays the details of a selected event and allows a user to join or leave the waitlist based on their current status.
    EventSampledActivity
    Activity that displays a sampled view of an event for a user who has received an invitation.
    HomeActivity
    Home activity that displays the user's events in three categories: confirmed, pending, and past.
    NotificationsActivity
    Shows user all notifications sent from organizers of events.
    OrganizerEventActivity
    Activity that allows event organizers to view and manage their events.
    PreviewActivity
    Activity for previewing event details before confirming creation.
    ProfileActivity
    Activity that displays the user's profile and allows the user to: Edit profile details (name, email, phone) Toggle notification and location preferences Delete the profile
    QRActivity
    Activity for scanning QR codes to find events.
    SearchActivity
    Activity that allows users to search and view active events.
